name: Pixel: ru\u00b2
blurb: A platformer that has puzzle and shooter elements, with mechanics like gravity manipulation and color theory based combat.

rewards.reward: The Bit - You're 7 bits short of a byte but you still want to help.  Thank you!
The Byte - Receive a copy of Pixel for only $8!  Supplies of this deal are limited because you can only fit so many values in a byte.
16 million colors for $16 dollars - Receive a copy of Pixel.
The Red-Green-Blue Bundle - Receive THREE copies of Pixel so you and two of your friends can play together.

Become Part of the Game - Get your name in the credits along with a single word message*.  You will also receive a single copy of Pixel.  *Subject to our approval.  If we do not approve of the message we will let you know and you can change it to something else.  If unacceptable messages are repeatedly submitted, they may be added to a Wall of Shame.
The Color Channel - Receive EIGHT copies of Pixel so you and your friends can put together your own 8-bit multiplayer team.

Become Part of the Game - Get your name and a 64 character message* in the credits.  You will also receive a single copy of Pixel.  *Subject to our approval.  If we do not approve of the message we will let you know and you can change it to something else.  If unacceptable messages are repeatedly submitted, they may be added to a Wall of Shame.
The Real World - Receive a special backer t-shirt for Pixel and a copy of the game.

Become Part of the Game - Send in any picture* you choose along with a 128 character message* and have both next to your name in the credits.  Advertisements are allowed.  You will also receive a single copy of Pixel.  *Subject to our approval.  If we do not approve of the picture or message we will let you know and you can change it to something else.  If unacceptable messages are repeatedly submitted, they may be added to a Wall of Shame.

Become Part of the Game - Send in a picture* of yourself or anything else you want along with a 256 character message, have both next to your name in the credits, and have a game level made using your image.  You will also receive a single copy of Pixel.  *Subject to our approval.  If we do not approve of the picture or message we will let you know and you can change it to something else.  If unacceptable messages are repeatedly submitted, they may be added to a Wall of Shame.

Become Part of the Game - Have your name (or the name of your choice)* included as a character name in the game's backstory, get a special thank you for being part of the Pixel story and have a message of your choice* in the credits, and receive a copy of the game and a special backer t-shirt.  *Subject to our approval. If we do not approve of the message or name, we will let you know and you can change it to something else. If unacceptable messages are repeatedly submitted, they may be added to a Wall of Shame.
The Kibibit - Receive all of the "Become Part of the Game" rewards, plus 8 copies of the game and a special backer t-shirt.  You will also receive a special "kb" icon next to your name in-game.

Presentation - Southeast United States - We will visit your gathering or organization and do a presentation about game development focused mainly on developing a game engine.  Includes a limited number of favors and/or copies of the game, and a special thank you to you or your organization in the game's credits.  Exact details (such as date, length of presentation, gifts for attendees, etc.) subject to negotiation and cost.

Presentation - United States of America & Southern Canada (excluding Alaska & Hawaii) - We will visit your gathering or organization and do a presentation about game development focused mainly on developing a game engine.  Includes a limited number of favors and/or copies of the game, and a special thank you to you or your organization in the game's credits.  Exact details (such as date, length of presentation, gifts for attendees, etc.) subject to negotiation and cost.

Presentation - International - We will visit you almost anywhere and do a presentation about game development focused mainly on developing a game engine.  Includes a limited number of favors and/or copies of the game, and a special thank you to you or your organization in the game's credits.  Exact details (such as date, length of presentation, gifts for attendees, etc.) subject to negotiation and cost.
